name: BuyYourLuck
description:
Dive into a new adventure as a Dice.

You have to run for your life to succeed.

Every 20 secondes you will change your Dice Power and Dice Color.

Some Doors are locked if you are not in the right Dice Color

Collect Coins to buy some new

And most important Be Lucky !

Control:

Controls are simple you need only two inputs

The Game was made for the MigJam#7

My Objectives for this jam were to test a runner game and to understand how it works to create a good game feel with random things.
